  • Jul 25, 2012

    Busy first few days of the holiday

    Ordered a camera and started using it (or trying to use it).
    Got a top box on the car (with roof bars).
    Put the tent up and fixed it.
    Took stuff to the dump.
    Sorted out some duff bank accounts.
    Sorted out a credit card.
    Walked in the forest (and got muddy jumping over a stream).
    Switched broadband provider.
    Lots and lots of gardening (mostly weeding).
    Met up with mum and had her birthday lunch.
    Lots of fun stuff on minecraft.
    Painting water paints.
    Painting the hall (including buying all the materials).
    Got a paddling pool, filled it up and splashed around.
